snippet: The patriarch of the Russian Orthodox Church encouraged Russians to adopt orphans, as the country adjusts to a decision to bar Americans from adopting Russian children.
abstract: Russian Orthodox Church Patriarch Kirill I uses his Christmas address to encourage Russians to adopt orphans, as country adjusts to decision to bar Americans from adopting Russian children.
lead_paragraph: The patriarch of the Russian Orthodox Church encouraged Russians to adopt orphans, as the country adjusts to a decision to bar Americans from adopting Russian children.

headline.seo: Russia: Orthodox Leader Presses for More Adoptions
headline.main: Russia: Orthodox Leader Presses for More Adoptions
headline.print_headline: Russia: Orthodox Leader Presses for More Adoptions
